value.desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

value.name: Beidou
value.desc: Capitana dell'equipaggio della Crux. Una donna diretta e indipendente.

value.name: Straccetti di carne saltati
value.desc: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.
